name: Disassemble Topology Diagram
description: Disassemble a topology diagram into its constituent parts.

outputParameters.name: node_keys
outputParameters.description: All the node keys in the topology diagram.

outputParameters.name: origin_node_keys
outputParameters.description: The keys of the origin nodes in the topology diagram.

outputParameters.name: support_node_keys
outputParameters.description: The keys of the support nodes in the topology diagram.

outputParameters.name: edge_keys
outputParameters.description: All the edge keys in the topology diagram.

outputParameters.name: trail_edge_keys
outputParameters.description: The keys of the trail edges in the topology diagram.

outputParameters.name: deviation_edge_keys
outputParameters.description: The keys of the deviation edges in the topology diagram.

outputParameters.name: sequence_keys
outputParameters.description: The keys of the sequences in the topology diagram.

outputParameters.name: trail_keys
outputParameters.description: The keys of the trails in the topology diagram.

outputParameters.name: auxiliary_trail_keys
outputParameters.description: The keys of the auxiliary trails in the topology diagram.
